#summary How to run the application
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

*Preview* This is help you start running OSM.


= Details =

In order to run OSM, please follow these steps:
  # Checkout the code from repository
  # Install latest version of [http://db.apache.org/derby/derby_downloads.html Derby Database] (Currently OSM run on version 10.9.1.0). The reason is I don't want to repopulate initial data every time restart this app.
  # go to mavenized-web folder.
  # run mvn tomcat7:run.
